resources.string: Please first allow permissions by toggling them in the settings, and then click the button below to start the SIAS evaluation. Once taken, the score will be displayed and then saved to your device. If you retake the test, the new score will not be saved. Please, do not clear any application space for the duration of the study.
I get nervous if I have to speak with someone in authority (teacher, boss, etc.).
I have difficulty making eye contact with others.
I become tense if I have to talk about myself or my feelings.
I find it difficult to mix comfortably with the people I work with.
I find it easy to make friends my own age.
I tense up if I meet an acquaintance in the street.
When mixing socially, I am uncomfortable.
I feel tense if I am alone with just one other person.
I am at ease meeting people at parties, etc.
I have difficulty talking with other people.
I find it easy to think of things to talk about.
I worry about expressing myself in case I appear awkward.
I find it difficult to disagree with another’s point of view.
I have difficulty talking to attractive persons of the opposite sex.
I find myself worrying that I won’t know what to say in social situations.
I am nervous mixing with people I don’t know well.
I feel I’ll say something embarrassing when talking.
When mixing in a group, I find myself worrying I will be ignored.
I am tense mixing in a group.
I am unsure whether to greet someone I know only slightly.
The option to disable this is turned on for the purpose of the study. Please do not manually go into the system settings and change it from there.
Use the button below to turn on and off the data collection.
Data is being collected in the background.
This is due to data collection being disabled in the app. Please click here to go to enable it.
A system error occurred and the test score could not be saved. Please try again by clicking the button, or if the error persists, quit and immediately email me at 2255541h@student.gla.ac.uk.
If you would like to know more about this test, you can find more information in the application settings.
Thank you for taking the test. Your SIAS score is
Please make sure to enable the Usage Statistics permisssion and then disable battery optimisations for the app to work as intended. You can find this in the settings.
Shows a notification if data is being collected or not
